rss.channel:
医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
降血压药物可以更广泛地用于预防偏头痛关于所有类别的血压 (BP) 药物在预防偏头痛方面的积极作用的国际研究的首次已知大规模审查表明，这些广泛使用的药物可以比目前的做法更广泛、更低成本地使用，根据今天发表在《头痛》杂志上的一篇新论文。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230627/Blood-Pressure-lowering-medications-could-be-used-more-widely-to-prevent-migraines.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230627/Blood-Pressure-lowering-medications-could-be-used-more-widely-to-prevent-migraines.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ac6a7448-0a29-4f41-a359-713bb5dcd9a0 Tue, 27 Jun 2023 23:54:00 -0400 Blood pressure lowering medications could be used more widely to prevent migraines
研究探讨了非洲裔人群子宫内膜癌的发病率和趋势与白人女性相比，黑人女性被诊断患有晚期子宫癌（也称为子宫内膜癌）和发展为侵袭性肿瘤的风险更高。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230627/Study-explores-the-incidence-and-trends-for-endometrial-cancer-among-African-descent-populations.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230627/Study-explores-the-incidence-and-trends-for-endometrial-cancer-among-African-descent-populations.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4ed19eef-d767-4c04-a520-6040f750f500 Tue, 27 Jun 2023 23:48:00 -0400 Study explores the incidence and trends for endometrial cancer among African descent populations
高于推荐剂量的维生素 D 可降低心房颤动的风险东芬兰大学的一项新研究表明，连续五年服用高于推荐剂量的维生素 D 可以降低老年男性和女性患房颤的风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230627/Higher-than-recommended-doses-of-vitamin-D-linked-to-lower-risk-of-atrial-fibrillation.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230627/Higher-than-recommended-doses-of-vitamin-D-linked-to-lower-risk-of-atrial-fibrillation.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4deb72ee-8844-447e-b98c-e749f349b0c2 Tue, 27 Jun 2023 23:43:00 -0400 Higher-than-recommended doses of vitamin D linked to lower risk of atrial fibrillation
聊天机器人干预可有效改善身体活动、饮食和睡眠研究发现，聊天机器人干预可以有效改善身体活动、饮食和睡眠。该研究强调了聊天机器人在不同人群和年龄组中的功效，强调了它们在个性化医疗服务方面的潜力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230627/Chatbot-interventions- effective-in-improving-physical-activity-diet-and-sleep.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230627/Chatbot-interventions- effective-in-improving-physical-activity-diet-and-sleep.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0ec4605f-c755-465d-becc-e513ae5b1c5c Tue, 27 Jun 2023 23:26:00 -0400 Chatbot interventions effective in improving physical activity, diet, and sleep
婴儿配方奶粉短缺导致不安全喂养方法增加加州大学戴维斯分校研究人员的一项调查显示，去年婴儿配方奶粉短缺期间，近一半依靠配方奶粉喂养婴儿的父母采取了可能有害的喂养方法。该研究发表在《BMC 儿科》杂志上。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230627/Infant-formula-shortage-led-to-an-increase-in-unsafe-feeding-methods.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230627/Infant-formula-shortage-led-to-an-increase-in-unsafe-feeding-methods.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6f2bc1aa-ccbf-4b04-937d-33629620e84a Tue, 27 Jun 2023 23:01:00 -0400 Infant formula shortage led to an increase in unsafe feeding methods
新型放射性核素药物为治疗多种癌症带来了希望一种新发现的放射性核素制剂 (CB-2PA-NT) 已被证明具有高肿瘤摄取、持续肿瘤保留和临床前模型中的高对比度，使其成为新型治疗诊断方法的主要候选者。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230627/New-radionuclide-based-agent-offers-hope-for-treating-a-variety-of-cancers.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230627/New-radionuclide-based-agent-offers-hope-for-treating-a-variety-of-cancers.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a3291e7f-5a46-41a1-abf0-5a8c3d08c261 Tue, 27 Jun 2023 22:56:10 -0400 New radionuclide-based agent offers hope for treating a variety of cancers
新方法可以彻底改变抗氧化剂向干细胞的输送随着年龄的增长，我们的身体会随着时间的推移而发生变化和退化，这个过程称为衰老。干细胞具有转变为其他细胞类型的独特能力，也会经历衰老​​，这在试图维持细胞培养用于治疗用途时提出了一个问题。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230627/New-method-could-revolutionize-the-delivery-of-antioxidants-to-stem-cells.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230627/New-method-could-revolutionize-the-delivery-of-antioxidants-to-stem-cells.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9656bcd9-691c-47a7-b614-0ad4f8682920 Tue, 27 Jun 2023 22:54:46 -0400 New method could revolutionize the delivery of antioxidants to stem cells
图片警告具有冲击力：研究发现父母为孩子购买含糖饮料的数量减少研究调查了图片健康警语对父母为儿童购买含糖饮料的影响，结果显示减少了 17%。该研究旨在利用二次试验数据揭示这种效应背后的心理机制。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230627/Pictorial-warnings-pack-a-punch-Study-finds-decrease-in-parents-purchases-of-sugary-drinks-for-kids.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230627/Pictorial-warnings-pack-a-punch-Study-finds-decrease-in-parents-purchases-of-sugary-drinks-for-kids.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8c499ed0-fa7b-4fbf-b07a-468879b6a25b Tue, 27 Jun 2023 22:41:00 -0400 Pictorial warnings pack a punch: Study finds decrease in parents' purchases of sugary drinks for kids
新型 PET 放射性示踪剂在诊断肥胖患者冠状动脉疾病方面表现出高敏感性和特异性根据 2023 年核医学学会上发表的研究，与 99mTc-SPECT 心肌灌注成像 (MPI) 相比，一种新型 PET 灌注放射性示踪剂 18F-flurpiridaz 可以诊断肥胖患者的冠状动脉疾病 (CAD)，具有更高的敏感性和特异性和分子成像年会。 18F-flurpiridaz PET MPI 在比 99mTc-SPECT MPI 更低的辐射剂量下获得图像，并且在肥胖和非肥胖患者中表现相似。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230627/Novel-PET-radiotracer-shows-high-sensitivity-specificity-in-diagnosing-coronary-artery-disease-in-obese-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230627/Novel-PET-radiotracer-shows-high-sensitivity-specificity-in-diagnosing-coronary-artery-disease-in-obese-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3cea22c0-e95e-4a59-af5c-ae565501bd95 Tue, 27 Jun 2023 22:38:30 -0400 Novel PET radiotracer shows high sensitivity, specificity in diagnosing coronary artery disease in obese patients
与标准糖尿病治疗相比，代谢手术可提供更好的结果、更少的退化正如彭宁顿生物医学研究中心和其他机构的研究人员最近发表的一份报告所述，与药物或生活方式干预相比，代谢或减肥手术对 1 级肥胖患者的血糖控制效果更好，药物使用量更少，2 型糖尿病缓解率更高。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230627/Metabolic-surgery-provides-better-results-lesser-regression-than-standard-diabetes-management.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230627/Metabolic-surgery-provides-better-results-lesser-regression-than-standard-diabetes-management.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3dd8ec1a-005e-445e-9cb7-ac69e1215e78 Tue, 27 Jun 2023 22:32:04 -0400 Metabolic surgery provides better results, lesser regression than standard diabetes management
